page.title: 17Working in Monmouth
page.content: My name is Alison, I am 19 years old and I{work}at Lawrence Preston {Electronics}on the{Wonastow Industrial {Estate}as an electronic board assembler,manufacturing radios and computers. It takes me 10 mins. to get to work by car. I start work at 8.00 with a coffee break at 10.15, then on to 12.30 when I have my 1/2 hour dinner break. Sometimes I eat my sandwiches in the car, or walk to the nearby shops with my friends. There is a short afternoon break and I normally finish work at 4.30 but sometimes work on to 5.30, but then I get stuck in traffic jams. Although I completed{training}as a typist I was unable to get secretarial work, anyway this job is better paid and I was glad to work after being on the{"dole"}for two years.
